mechanics.condition: Target of attack is the charmer

mechanics.trigger: Charmed creature attempts to target with ability or effect
mechanics.condition: Ability or effect is harmful AND target is the charmer
Ability check is to interact socially with the charmed creature
mechanics.outcome: Charmer gains Advantage on the ability check

description_text: - A charmed creature can't attack the charmer or target the charmer with harmful abilities or magical effects. - The charmer has advantage on any ability check to interact socially with the creature.
